thread.section_title: Coolicool 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Coolicool 的点评意见 | coolicool.com
thread.title: Nino Barber
thread.title_full: Coolicool 的点评人 Nino Barber

author: Nino Barber
title: Nino Barber
text: Purchased a phone 1st it said quick 2day shipping, I didn't receive for a month. On the website the phone I ordered said for WORLDWIDE use and unlocked, FALSE doesn't work with any carrier near me. I believe since I bought the phone under false pretense, I should be issued a full refund. But coolicool doesn't. Please people becareful
